prompts: Create a serpentine Pokemon with metallic scales and bright blue accents.
Imagine a powerful steel-type creature that resembles a giant snake.
Generate an intimidating Pokemon with jagged features and a gray color palette.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies strength and resilience with a rocky texture.
Design a dual-type Pokemon that thrives in caves and mountainous terrains.
Make a Pokemon with a fierce gaze and a body covered in sharp metal.
Give me a Pokemon that has both a sleek appearance and a heavy build.
